Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 106-109.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 43.
Mr. Franks moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 686.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To designate a United States courthouse in Brownsville, Texas, as the "Garza-Vela United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse located at the corner of Seventh Street and East Jackson Street in Brownsville, Texas, as the Garza-Vela United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate a United States courthouse in Brownsville, Texas, as the "Garza-Vela United States Courthouse".
